title: Sympathy For The Devil
lyrics:
[intro] (E)  (D)  (A)  (E)
 
(E)Please allow me to intro(D)duce myself, I'm a (A)man of wealth and (E)taste
(E) I've been around for a (D)long, long year, stolen (A)many a man's soul and (E)faith
 
(E) I was around when (D)Jesus Christ had His (A)moment of doubt and (E)pain
(E) Made damn sure that (D)Pilate washed his (A)hands and sealed his (E)fate
 
(B) Pleased to meet you, hope you guess my (E)name
But what's (B)puzzling you, is the nature of my (E)game
 
(E) I stuck around St. (D)Petersburg, when I (A)saw it was time for a (E)change
(E) I killed the Tzar and his (D)ministers, Anas(A)tasia screamed in (E)vain
 
(E) I rode a tank, held a (D)gen'ral's rank when the (A)blitzkrieg raged and the (E)bodies stank
 
(B) Pleased to meet you, hope you guess my (E)name
But what's (B)puzzling you, is the nature of my (E)game
 
[start the “ooh-ooh” and continue until the end]
(E) I watched with glee while your (D)kings and queens
Fought for (A)ten decades for the (E)gods they made
I (E)shouted out "Who killed the (D)Kennedys?", when (A)after all it was (E)you and me
 
(E) Let me please intro(D)duce myself, I am a (A)man of wealth and (E)taste
(E) And I lay traps for (D)troubadours, who get (A)killed before they reach Bom(E)bay
 
(B) Pleased to meet you, hope you guess my (E)name
But what's (B)puzzling you, is the nature of my (E)game
 
[instrumental] (E)  (D)  (A)  (E)   x2
 
(B) Pleased to meet you, hope you guess my (E)name
But what's (B)confusing you, is just the nature of my (E)game
 
Just as (E)every cop is a (D)criminal, and (A)all the sinners (E)saints
As (E)heads is tails, just call me (D) Lucifer, 'cause I'm in (A)need of some re(E)straint
 
So if you (E)meet me, have some (D)courtesy, have some (A)sympathy and some (E)taste
Use (E)all your well-learned (D)politesse, or I'll (A)lay your soul to (E)waste
 
(B) Pleased to meet you, hope you guess my (E)name
But what's (B)puzzling you, is the nature of my (E)game
 
[instrumental] (E)  (D)  (A)  (E)  x2
(E-single strum) [end]
